--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Cliffjumper looked around, a bit suprised at how he took charge. 
"All
> right then, Transform, and Roll Out." he said, with hope in his 
voice.
> Cliffjumper jumped up, and all his legs and arms tucked in as he 
landed
> on the ground in car mode. Beachcomber turned around, and lay down 
on
> his stomach, as his legs folded back, and his arms in.
> 
> Firedrill wakled up to Redhot. "Do you need a ride, or do you have
> enough energy?" he asked.


::REDHOT::

    Redhot smiled at Beachcomber.
    "I think... you've got your... answer." he said with a smirk. He 
de-activated his colour scanners and watched the others Transform, a 
tinge of envy in his gaze. He seemed startled when Firedrill 
approached.
    "I can... hover for a while." he answered, calm. "However, I ...I 
can not... Transform. Nor... will... I have the energy... for the 
entire trip." He winked, mischevious suddenly. "Maybe then... you can 
give... me a ride."

Northlight
Domnijoe productions
****************
